title: Data model for H2020 FORTESIES project
description: Data model for H2020 FORTESIES project

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be fortesie

phaseVoltage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. The voltage between each phase and neutral conductor. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'Volts'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the voltage

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the voltage

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the voltage

phaseToPhaseVoltage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Voltage between phases. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'Volts'

L12.description: Property. Value for phase 1 to phase 2 voltage

L23.description: Property. Value for phase 2 to phase 3 voltage

L31.description: Property. Value for phase 3 to phase 1 voltage

current.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Electrical current. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'Ampere'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the current

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the current

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the current

N.description: Property. Value for phase neutral of the current

totalActivePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total Active Power consumed. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'Watt'

totalReactivePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total Reactive Power consumed. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'volt-ampere-reactive'

totalApparentPower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total Apparent Power consumed. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'volt-ampere'

powerFactor.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Power factor for each phase

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the power factor

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the power factor

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the power factor

activePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Active power consumed per phase. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'Watt'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the active power

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the active power

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the active power

reactivePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Fundamental frequency reactive power. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'volts-ampere-reactive'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the reactive power

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the reactive power

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the reactive power

apparentPower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Apparent power consumed per phase. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'Watt'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the apparent power

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the apparent power

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the apparent power

totalApparentEnergyImport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total energy imported i.e. consumed (with regards to apparent power). The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour'

totalApparentEnergyExport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Total energy exported (with regards to apparent power). The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour'

frequency.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The frequency of the circuit. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'Hertz'

nominalWaterFlowHeating.description: Property. Nominal water flow (refers to nominal heating capacity). Usually measured in m3/s

nominalSupplyWaterTemperatureHeating.description: Property. Nominal supply water temperature (refers to nominal heating capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K)

nominalReturnWaterTemperatureHeating.description: Nominal return water temperature (refers to nominal heating capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K)

nominalWaterFlowCooling.description: Property. Nominal water flow (refers to nominal cooling capacity). Usually measured in m3/s

thermalEnergyImport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Thermal energy imported i.e. consumed. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour'

thermalEnergyExport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Thermal energy exported i.e. generated. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour'

gasConsumption.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gas consumed. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20).'

relativeHumidity.description: Property. Relative Humidity of the air (a number between 0 and 1 representing the range of 0% to 100%)

pm25.description: Property. Particulate matter 2.5 micrometers or less in diameter

windDirection.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Direction of the wind bet

windSpeed.description: Property. Model:'http//schema.org/Number'. Intensity of the wind

precipitation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Amount of water rain registered. Units:'Liters per square meter'.

contactStatus.description: Property. The contact indication, true = broken (open), false = in place (closed)

heatingDegreeDays.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'.Heating degree days are calculated based on the number of degrees that the average outdoor temperature falls below a specified baseline temperature over a given period of a day

coolingDegreeDays.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Cooling degree days are calculated based on the number of degrees that the average outdoor temperature rises above a specified baseline temperature over a given period of a day.

referenceHeatingDegreeDays.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'.Reference heating degree days are calculated based on the number of degrees that the average outdoor temperature falls below a specified baseline temperature over a given period of a day used for the definition of the contact ESCO and customer.

referenceCoolingDegreeDays.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reference heating degree days are calculated based on the number of degrees that the average outdoor temperature falls below a specified baseline temperature over a given period of a day used for the definition of the contact ESCO and customer.

referenceElectricalConsumption.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reference electrical  energy consumption used for the calculation of the baseline consumption. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour'

referenceThermalConsumption.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'.Reference thermal energy consumption used for the calculation of the baseline consumption. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour'

variableTerm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Variable term of the equation (varaibleTerm*X+constantTerm) for the calculation of the baseline consumption.

constantTerm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real consumption of energy in the period to be evaluated for the calculation of the EPC.

excludedConsumption.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Consumptions that are excluded from the EPC due to various reasons. For example sanitary water consumption is excluded from savings calculations in most EPCs because renovations doesn’t affect them. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour'

excludedSavings.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Savings that are excluded from the EPC due to various reasons. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour'

agreedSavings.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Percentage of savings agreed by the contract. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'%'

thresholdSavings.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Percentage of savings that determines the interval in which the EPC bonus or malus is applied. For example a +-5% range, in which neither a bonus or malus is applied. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'%'

escoBonusPercentage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Percentage of the bonus which is given to the ESCO. This percentage can be for the whole contract or different for each year. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'%'

consumerBonusPercentage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Percentage of the bonus which is given to the Consumer. This percentage can be for the whole contract or different for each year. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'%'

escoMalusPercentage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Percentage of the malus which is given to the ESCO. This percentage can be for the whole contract or different for each year. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'%'

consumerMalusPercentage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Percentage of the malus which is given to the Consumer. This percentage can be for the whole contract or different for each year. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/UNECERec20). Units:'%'

fixedPrice.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fixed price of the contract charged to the consumer each month.

energyPrice.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Energy price for each month, needed for the calculation of the savings and billed price.

mobile_user_id.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. The id of the user of the mobile app. It links to a specific building, dwelling (ie urn:ngsi-ld:fortesie:demo_1:building_ax8:dwelling_asx)

challenge_id.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'.  A string representing the challenge for the current user

challenge_status.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/TEXT'. The status of the challenge WON, FAILED

challenge_points_awarded.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The points the user won from the challenge (if applicable

recommendation_id.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The unique id of the recommendation for reference

enum: CHALLENGE (eg You won challenge X congratulations)
RECOMMENDATION (eg. You could lower your temperature X degrees for the next few days to achieve...)
WARNING (eg.Not enough measurements available for the past few days. Please check your gateway connection)
recommendation_type.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. f available the recommendation type
